meanings.sent1: The sulphureous rocks in the cave emitted a strong smell.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the sulphureous properties of the mineral.
meanings.sent3: The sulphureous gas made everyone wrinkle their noses in the lab.
meanings.sent4: The sulphureous clouds in the sky painted a dramatic scene at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The sulphureous odor lingered in the air long after the volcano erupted.

meanings.definition: Having the smell or taste of sulfur.
meanings.sent1: The soup had a sulphureous taste that reminded me of rotten eggs.
meanings.sent2: The hot springs released a sulphureous smell that filled the valley.
meanings.sent3: The sulphureous aroma from the kitchen made my stomach growl in hunger.
meanings.sent4: The sulphureous flavor of the water made it undrinkable.
meanings.sent5: The sulphureous scent from the matchstick signaled the start of the campfire.
